Pop Check

POP Check

A POP Check is an anchor SEL activity that provides structure, establishes routine, and allows for a quick self-awareness check-in and self-regulation practice.

During a POP Check you:

  • PAUSE and take a few deep breaths;
  • OWN what you are feeling; and
  • PRACTICE a re-centering, energizing, or calming activity.

The video below will lead you through the first two steps by helping you PAUSE and OWN what you are feeling emotionally in the present moment. As you experience the POP Check think about how you could use it for your own self-care as well as how you could use it with students.
